analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. Investigate the root cause and optimize the page to improve its load time.
insights: The Time to First Byte (TTFB) is relatively low for all pages, indicating that the server response time is adequate.
First Contentful Paint (FCP) is also acceptable for all pages, suggesting that the initial rendering of content is fast.
The duration of the tests is consistent, ranging from 1022 ms to 1402 ms, indicating that the overall test environment is stable.
To improve the user experience, prioritize optimizing the "How It Works" page and then focus on reducing the homepage load time.
